definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: It's 248 Gerrrran marks at today's selling rate.
sentences.chinese: 今天的卖出价是二百四十八德国马克。

sentences.english: In 1985 the dollar stopped overshooting against the yen and the German mark.
sentences.chinese: 1985年，美元兑日元及德国马克汇率停止了飙升。

sentences.english: Gateway to southeast Asia where dollars and Deutschmarks get turned into counterfeit watches and genuine scars.
sentences.chinese: 将你的美元或德国马克变成假名牌酒和真正的伤疤。

sentences.english: I was thinking about Raiden's DM's and got a little creative.
sentences.chinese: 我在想雷电的德国马克的，得到了一个小创意。

definition: Fabi, first currency issued by the 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] in 1935, in use until 1948

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
